product_name: SkirtSports Free Me T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The SkirtSports Free Me T-shirt offers smooth stretch and quick-drying comfort. A relaxed fit, complete tummy coverage and short sleeves provide just the coverage you need for your workout. Soft, lightweight polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin to keep you dry and cool; fabric dries quickly so you can wash and wear it again in no time. Full-coverage short sleeves; modest V-neck; two 3 in. rear hem vents relax the fit at your hips. Closeout.
short_description: The SkirtSports Free Me T-shirt offers smooth stretch and quick-drying comfort. A relaxed fit, complete tummy coverage and short sleeves provide just the coverage you need for your workout.
